name: Co-Co CORN MAFIA
description:
Squads of corn flakes captured the plants and produced their clones.
Only you can stop them!

Kill them, as well as their bosses.
Find new weapons and open new levels.
And all this in the style of old games!

Features:
- Many hours of gameplay
- Unique locations and enemies.
- Hardcore gameplay
- Nostalgia for old games
